text: Ani he loka allahala soduna asa vastunci upasana karatata, je na tyanna hani pohacavu sakatila ani na tyanna labha pohacavu sakatila ani mhanatata ki he allahacya samora amaci sipharasa karanare aheta. Tumhi sanga, kaya tumhi allahala asa gostinci khabara deta, jya to janata nahi akasamadhye va dharatita. To pavitra ani srestha ahe tya lokancya sirka (sahabhagi karanya) pasuna
